item.title: [508] UnitScape Godsword Minigame! [508]
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:4, topic:332415”]Ok just a few questions…

1, Why didn’t you use the setCoords method instead of teleTo, That way you wouldn’t have the teleport GFX and would be more liek the original 317 GS Mini

2, Does the Chaos Elemental remove your weapon?

3, Why are you trying to make 508’s like 317’s??

edit; What is the song in the video?? Its quite good, Post me a dl link please…[/quote]

  1. idk

  2. not atm, dought ever, my laptop fucking broke and lost EVERYTHING i’ve ever worked on

  3. im just recreating a MINIGAME that was on a “317” im not making a 508 like a 317, it was just that this minigame appeared on a 317 lol

  4. Levas Polka [Basshunter Remix] AWESOME

Read full topic

item.title: [508] UnitScape Godsword Minigame! [508]
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

My Video Pretty Much Explains It All…
I Used Mezzy-Scape[508] Source + Client
But I Coded This Minigame FROM SCRATCH

/* Drop List */
Bandos Hilt
GS Shard 1
Ashs x 74
GS Shards(1)
Tool Kit
Death Rune x 1631
Saradomin Hilt
Noted Bucket x 453
GS Shard 2
GS Shards(3)
Burnt Curry x 512
Nature Rune x 2311
Zamorak Hilt
GS Shards(2)
GS Shard 3
GS Blade
Law Rune
Saradomin Sword
Armadyl Hilt
Teddy Bear

/* Other Infomation */
Air Elemental: Max hit = 10 || Hp = 100
Water Elemental: Max hit = 20 || Hp = 200
Earth Elemental: Max hit = 30 || Hp = 300
Fire Elemental: Max hit = 40 || Hp = 400
Chaos Elemental: Max hit = 50 || Hp = 500

Video Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3-Mr4LKcR2U

Just Say If I’ve Missed Anything.
